xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 22 July 2013
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 02:03 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 08:32 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 09:18 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 10:21 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 12:47 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 14:41 <sdumitriu1> Hey kids, still waiting for those weekly status updates 14:44 <bvancea> hey sdumitriu1 14:44 <bvancea> sorry, I had it saved as a draft 14:51 <bvancea> each week I use the email from the previous week for the status, and I always forget to change the email subject 14:51 <bvancea> thank god for the undo feature 15:06 <mcupak> mine should be there now as well 15:07 <sdumitriu1> Thanks 15:08 <sdumitriu1> bvancea: I see that you're managing to do exactly what you set out to do 15:08 <sdumitriu1> You've discovered your velocity 15:23 <bvancea> sdumitriu: thanks :) 15:28 <bvancea> how did the phenotips release go last week? 15:28 <sdumitriu1> It didn't 15:28 <sdumitriu1> I still have one thing to implement 15:29 <bvancea> oh, I see 15:29 <bvancea> what do you have remaining? 15:31 <sdumitriu1> An authentication module that would allow integrating PhenoTips into LIMS (an MRS) 15:31 <sdumitriu1> It's required by one of our top users 15:32 <bvancea> I see 15:32 <bvancea> what's a MRS 15:32 <sdumitriu1> Medical Record System, I think 15:33 <sdumitriu1> http://www.ruro.com/software/lims-247/overview 15:47 <bvancea> O.o 15:47 <bvancea> nice 17:03 <bvancea> good night all
